channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 美国正在通过史上最严格的尾气排放规定，但同时也给予汽车制造商更多的时间来遵守规定
item.description:
The U.S. is adopting the strictest-ever rules for tailpipe emissions but also giving automakers more time to comply https://t.co/aF171qrpdv https://t.co/aF171qrpdv

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 20, 2024

item.title: 许多 Z 世代意外地找到了生活在数百或数千英里之外的浪漫伴侣。这个不太可能的媒人就是 Discord 平台。
item.description:
Many Gen Z’ers are unexpectedly finding romantic partners who live hundreds or thousands of miles away. The unlikely matchmaker is the platform Discord. https://t.co/XXjIB0Cmg1 https://t.co/XXjIB0Cmg1

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 20, 2024

item.title: 2021 年，亚利桑那州启动了一项计划，旨在扩大那些请不起或找不到律师的人获得法律服务的机会。三年后，该计划吸引了华尔街的目光。
item.description:
In 2021, Arizona launched a program to expand access to legal services for people who can’t afford or find lawyers. Three years later, the program is catching Wall Street’s eye. https://t.co/Z9Zh0kmNSt https://t.co/Z9Zh0kmNSt

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 20, 2024

item.title: 现在可以通过皮肤活检来诊断帕金森病，这种活检可以检测出帕金森病患者神经内的一种异常蛋白质。"皮肤检测基本上就是大脑的一扇窗"。
item.description:
Parkinson’s disease can now be diagnosed with a skin biopsy that can detect an abnormal protein people with Parkinson’s have inside their nerves.

“The skin test basically is a window into the brain." https://t.co/4Cf3TZwfVO https://t.co/4Cf3TZwfVO

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 20, 2024

item.title: 在一架中国客机坠毁并导致机上 132 人全部遇难两年后，当局表示仍在调查造成中国最致命空难之一的原因。
item.description:
Two years after a Chinese passenger jet dived into the ground and killed all 132 people aboard, authorities said they are still probing what caused one of China’s deadliest plane crashes https://t.co/s1Vhmjc7eW https://t.co/s1Vhmjc7eW

item.title: 约一年前，《华尔街日报》记者埃文-格什科维奇（Evan Gershkovich）在俄罗斯采访期间被拘留。#我们为那些想支持他的人提供资源。
item.description:
🧵Nearly a year ago, Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich was detained in Russia during a reporting trip.

He remains in a Moscow prison.

We’re offering resources for those who want to show their support for him. #IStandWithEvan https://t.co/ll83UMXlp5 pic.twitter.com/iAmDq2BOvj

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 20, 2024

item.title: 爱尔兰总理利奥-瓦拉德卡（Leo Varadkar）表示他将下台，称他认为自己不再是最合适的人选，并为即将到来的大选前产生新领导人铺平道路。
item.description:

item.title: 麦肯锡、波士顿咨询公司（BCG）和德勤（Deloitte）等老牌大型咨询公司受雇为全球最大的企业预测未来，但它们却弄错了自己的命运--其后果是一团糟
item.description:
Big and established consulting firms such as McKinsey, BCG and Deloitte, which are paid to predict the future for the world’s biggest corporations, have gotten their own destiny wrong—and the fallout is messy https://t.co/segQLHIHyu https://t.co/segQLHIHyu

item.title: "我太年轻了，不适合变老"。人们不遗余力地减少或阻止白发苍苍的过程。一些研究衰老问题的科学家认为，他们可能有所发现。
item.description:
“I’m too young to be old.” People are going to great lengths to reduce or halt the graying process. Some scientists of aging think they might be onto something. https://t.co/pkhJgmiu9b https://t.co/pkhJgmiu9b

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 20, 2024

item.title: 达美航空公司的一名飞行员因飞行时酒精含量超标两倍多而被判处 10 个月监禁。

item.title: 超级名模吉赛尔-邦辰（Gisele Bündchen）几乎每天都坚持锻炼，并保持简单的饮食习惯。"她说："我的全部目标就是尽我所能活得最长，活得最好。
item.description:
Supermodel Gisele Bündchen exercises almost daily and keeps her diet simple. “My whole goal is to live the longest I can living the best life that I can,” she said. https://t.co/69nP1SYY5G https://t.co/69nP1SYY5G

item.title: 来自 @WSJopinion：强大、毫不含糊的国家安全政策始于繁荣、可持续的经济。凯文-沃什（Kevin Warsh）写道，美国必须再次证明其经济体系的优越性。
item.description:

item.title: 当最高法院允许得克萨斯州自行逮捕和驱逐非公民时，美国南部边境的移民规则出现了摇摆不定的局面--直到另一家法院暂时阻止了该州的任何此类努力。
item.description:
